learnings.summary: Correction: - If you want the **Areas list** to be dynamic (instead of the fixed 4), I can switch it to `=UNIQUE
learnings.details: - If you want the **Areas list** to be dynamic (instead of the fixed 4), I can switch it to `=UNIQUE(MASTER_TASKS!F:F)` with a little guard to exclude blanks
